 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲהָהּ‎</span> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) **interjection alas!** [[Judg.11.35|Judg 11:35]]; [[2Kgs.3.10|2Kgs 3:10]]; [[2Kgs.6.5|2Kgs 6:5]]; [[2Kgs.6.15|2Kgs 6:15]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[Joel.1.15|Joel 1:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲהָהּ לַיּוֺם‎</span> ***alas for the day! for*** etc. In the combination <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲהָהּ אֲדֹנָי יֱהוִֺה‎</span> [[Josh.7.7|Josh 7:7]]; [[Judg.6.22|Judg 6:22]]; [[Jer.1.6|Jer 1:6]]; [[Jer.4.10|Jer 4:10]]; [[Jer.14.13|Jer 14:13]]; [[Jer.32.17|Jer 32:17]]; [[Ezek.4.14|Ezek 4:14]]; [[Ezek.9.8|Ezek 9:8]]; [[Ezek.11.13|Ezek 11:13]]; [[Ezek.21.5|Ezek 21:5]].
